checkitem.compliant: (( NAME = 'VERSION' AND substring(VALUE,0,7) = '2.00.01' AND substring(VALUE,0,14) >= '2.00.012.02' OR NAME = 'VERSION' AND substring(VALUE,0,7) = '2.00.02' AND substring(VALUE,0,14) >= '2.00.022.00' OR NAME = 'VERSION' AND substring(VALUE,0,7) = '2.00.03' AND substring(VALUE,0,14) >= '2.00.030.00' OR NAME = 'VERSION' AND substring(VALUE,0,7) = '2.00.04' AND substring(VALUE,0,14) >= '2.00.040.00' OR NAME = 'VERSION' AND substring(VALUE,0,6) = '1.00.1' AND substring(VALUE,0,14) >= '1.00.122.13') )
checkitem.noncompliant: ((NAME = 'VERSION' AND substring(VALUE,0,7) = '2.00.01' AND NOT(substring(VALUE,0,14) >= '2.00.012.02') OR NAME = 'VERSION' AND substring(VALUE,0,7) = '2.00.02' AND NOT(substring(VALUE,0,14) >= '2.00.022.00') OR NAME = 'VERSION' AND substring(VALUE,0,6) = '1.00.1' AND NOT(substring(VALUE,0,14) >= '1.00.122.13') ) )
